   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to RogotoParser's documentation!
========================================

The Rogoto Parser takes a string and parses it to allow us
to control our Rogoto Bot.

The API, the parser code, is available at :doc:`parser`

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   parser.rst

==================
